content: this legal case took place in the municipal court makarska the procedure started on 07072021 and the cost of the procedure was 2000 kuna the case involves the termination of a coownership property through a civil division and public auction the proposer filed a motion for termination arguing for a geometric division of the property the respondent objected claiming that the property had already been physically divided without the proposers consent after examining the evidence the court ruled in favor of the termination and ordered the property to be sold through a public auction the proceeds from the auction will be distributed proportionally among the coowners the court also determined that the costs of the termination should be borne by the coowners in proportion to their shares
